alert.note: Alert for Nacogdoches; Panola; Rusk; San Augustine; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 9:24AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Caddo Parish, southeastern Harrison, Panola, eastern Rusk, northern Nacogdoches, western Shelby and northwestern San Augustine Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 922 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Hallsville to 7 miles southwest of Nacogdoches. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nacogdoches, Marshall, Carthage, Center, Greenwood, Waskom, Tatum, Tenaha, Timpson, Oil City, Garrison, Beckville, Mooringsport, Gilliam, Deberry, Melrose, Elysian Fields, Pinehill, Martinsville and Trawick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for northwestern Louisiana...and eastern and northeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Nacogdoches; Panola; Rusk; San Augustine; Shelby
